item.title: Version 1.2.18 (Build 20260109.2)
item.description:
What's New

Improve XKeyIM direct input mode for Spotlight and overlay apps

  • Add automatic direct input mode detection for overlay apps (Spotlight, Raycast, Alfred)
  • Fix ESC key handling: proper undo in direct mode, pass through when no content
  • Add XKeyIM reset/reinstall functionality in IMKitHelper
  • Update InputSourcesSection UI with reset button
  • Clean up unused preferences and settings
  • Bump version to 1.2.18
